content.question:
“We can no longer be content with writing only the history of the victorious elites, or with detailing the subjugation of dominated ethnic groups . . . We thus need to uncover the history of ‘the people without a history.’ ”

Eric Wolf, anthropologist, 1982

Research on which of the following subjects would be the best example of the approach described in the exerpt above?

choices.label: The decision of the Ming Emperor to send Zheng He on voyages to the Indian Ocean
The lives of Amerindians engaged in the North American fur trade
The motivations for conversion to Islam in Spain after the Muslim conquest
The economics of the transatlantic slave trade

content.answer: The lives of Amerindians engaged in the North American fur trade
